footer.desc: Searching for truth through action. Creating sustainable positive change through environmental protection, children's wellness, and community empowerment.
footer.copyright: © 2024 SatyaKarma Welfare Foundation Society. All rights reserved.

callToAction.title: Join Our Mission
callToAction.desc: Be part of the change you want to see. Whether through volunteering, partnerships, or spreading awareness - every action counts towards a cleaner, healthier future for our children and communities.

missionOverview.title: Our Mission
missionOverview.desc: Searching for truth through action. We're dedicated to building sustainable communities through environmental awareness, children's wellness, and collaborative partnerships.
missionOverview.plasticDesc: Promoting compostable alternatives and environmental awareness in communities
missionOverview.activeDesc: Physical wellness and health awareness programs for the next generation
missionOverview.greenDesc: Tree planting and sustainable community partnership initiatives

focusAreas.title: Our Focus Areas
focusAreas.desc: We work across multiple areas to create sustainable positive change in our communities, focusing on environmental protection and children's wellness.

plastic.title: Plastic Pollution Awareness
plastic.desc: Educational campaigns and compostable product promotion to reduce plastic waste in communities.

children.title: Children's Physical Health
children.desc: Fitness workshops, outdoor activities, and health awareness programs for young minds and bodies.

tree.title: Tree Plantation Drives
tree.desc: Community-driven environmental restoration through organized tree planting and forest conservation.

community.title: Community Partnerships
community.desc: Collaborative sustainable development through education, empowerment, and local engagement.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.infoContent: SatyaKarma Welfare Foundation Society collects personal information only when voluntarily provided by individuals who wish to support our mission. This may include contact information for volunteers, donors, and partners.
privacyPolicy.useContent: We use collected information solely for the purpose of advancing our environmental and community initiatives. This includes communication about programs, events, and opportunities to get involved.
privacyPolicy.protectionContent: We implement appropriate security measures to protect personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer personal information to outside parties.
privacyPolicy.contactContent: For questions about this privacy policy or our data practices, please contact us at privacy@satyakarma.org or through our contact form.

newsletter.title: Stay Updated
newsletter.desc: Subscribe to our newsletter for the latest updates on our environmental initiatives and community programs.
newsletter.success: You've been subscribed to our newsletter.
newsletter.error: Failed to subscribe. Please try again.

validation.required: Please fill in all required fields.

blog.title: Blog & Updates
blog.desc: Stay updated with our latest initiatives, success stories, and environmental insights
